column1: Table 3. Percent of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005 who were arrested in another state following release, by number of prior out-of-state arrests
Report title: Multistate Criminal History Patterns of Prisoners Released in 30 States, NCJ 248942
Data Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
Author:(s) Matthew R. Durose, Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D., and Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D.
Table 3. Percent of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005 who were arrested in another state following release, by number of prior out-of-state arrests

Note: Prior out-of-state arrests include those that occurred before release in 2005 in another state. Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. See appendix table 15 for standard errors.
**Difference with comparison group is significant at the 95% confidence level.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
